The above is the link to the error files.

I've had this crash half the day. Did the whole "verify local files" option in Steam and it says that 2 files (but I cannot determine which ones) will need to be reacquired. Ok, then try to start the game again, same crash. In short, here's the main error I am finding in each of the crash reports: 

mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module mono.dll at 0033:c5d10e18.

So, if anyone can tell me how to solve this issue, please help a fellow star traveler...
